title: im getting really tired of riven...

replies.body:
Oh, man. I feel so baited ;-;

That's what I get for trying to help :I

> shield, damage, cc... nerf please...

Pretty much every champion has some sort of defensive mechanic, damage, and cc...

And Riven's defenses and CC aren't even that great.

> [{quoted}](name=67chrome,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iA9psE3l,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-20T20:26:38.727+0000)
>
> Pretty much every champion has some sort of defensive mechanic, damage, and cc...
> 
> And Riven's defenses and CC aren't even that great.

nerf them...

How would you like to see them nerfed? I feel that riot wouldn't move to make a change if the change desired isn't presented. I've played against Riven with many champions and have found that buying early armor can negate a lot of her damage. Her area of CC isn't that large, and can easily be dodged with a reliable escape, her ultimate is only useful if she manages to burst you down, armor and health can negate that, her shield is more or less useless when she's behind as it scales with her AD. What makes her overpowered?

What makes her overpowered?

op dmg, shield, cc, execute.
How is her damage over powered? Again, early armor reduces her damage, her shield is horrible if she's behind, her cc is easily dodge-able, and her execute only works if she burst's you.
